name: CULT MD
description: CULT: Your Ultimate WhatsApp COMPANION! Dive into the future of messaging with CULT, an advanced WhatsApp bot engineered by Mariana. Seamlessly blending automation with intelligent features, CULT is your go-to assistant for managing conversations, sending multimedia, and performing smart tasksâ€”all with just a simple command.

DATABASE_URL.description: Your MongoDB or other database URL.

MODE.description: Mode of the bot, either public or private.

PREFIX.description: Command prefix (one symbol only, except @ and +). Leave blank for multiple prefixes.

HKEY.description: Heroku API key, get one from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HAPP.description: Heroku app name, same as entered above.

statusview.description: Set to true if you want the bot to view statuses.

autoRead.description: Set to true if you want the bot to read messages automatically.

antidelete.description: Set to true if you want the bot to forward deleted messages.
